summary: replace call of valor with call of a powerfull immortal dragonborn + unlimited zombie.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATED v.2 :
NEW: If you start new game with this mod installed, player automatically learn 1st level of Call of Valor \"HERO\" plus added 50 dragon souls to unlock it. 
NOTE: You get this bonus only when you arrive at the scene where you have to face a bear in helgen keep cave. See the screenshot.
FIXED: Alduin wont be died because of falling damage when landing to helgen that make the player stuck when climbing up at the helgen keep tower.
FIXED: Female Valor you summon in level 1-2 has male zombie voice, its now has special female voice.
FIXED: Female Valor you summon has immortal state only for summoned level 3 valor, now level 1-2 of summoned valor are also immortal.
FIXED: When you start new game or loading a save your actor body might become female. Its now fixed!

What this mods do?
In Skyrim you can have hireling that can follow you forever, but can you have a powerfull dragonborn zombie that follow you forever? Previously you can summon hero of sovngarde by using dragon shout: Call of Valor. But they will summoned only 1-2 minutes and not too powerfull. With this mod call of valor summon immortal dragonborn. They cannot be killed by any means because set as invulnerable same as Alduin.
Additionally in this mod you can summon unlimited dead thrall along with your dragonborn.
What use of them if i cant kill essential people in skyrim? Well essential flag are removed for all people in skyrim. Their fate are truly in your hands.

What this mods contains and how to install?
ESP FILE:
1. miong.esp
-put in \"data\" folder, eg: D:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\ -- (put here) --
PEX FILE:
1. QF_DialogueMarkarthIntroWorld_000AF75F.pex
2. WIDeadBodyCleanupScript.pex
3. MQ305AlduinScript.pex
4. QF_MQ101_0003372B.pex
-put in \"scripts\" folder, eg: D:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\Scripts\\ -- (put here) --

Note:
1.For compatibility, it is already Tested in Skyrim UNPATCHED NON-STEAM Retail version.

Bugs:
1. Help the improvement via email: miongbesar(at)yahoo(dot)com

bye-bye
author: miongbesar
